title: Stochastic Differential Equations and Diffusion Models
tags: diffusion, ddpm, ito diffusion, stochastic differential equations, neural-sde
snippet: Diffusion models (Sohl-Dickstein et al., 2015)(Ho et al., 2020) are one of the freshest flavors of generative models in the market right now (at least as of writing this post). They have been shown to outperform GANs in certain settings (Dhariwal &amp; Nichol, 2021), and once trained, can als...

title: The Kantorovich-Rubinstein Duality
snippet: In this post we’ll talk about the Wasserstein-1 distance, which is a metric on the space of probability distributions, and the Kantorovich-Rubinstein duality, which establishes an elegant and rather useful dual for it. One of the many good things about this metric is that in many cases it yields ...

title: Let's Count!
snippet: For the first post, let’s talk about something so innate to our intuition, that we might as well call it… natural. You guessed it, today we’ll talk about natural numbers and the rather odd notions surrounding them.The set of all natural numbers, $\mathbb{N} = \{0, 1, 2, …\}$, of course, goes on f...
